Title: The Bride Wore Blood
Plot: When an old girlfriend shows up at the courthouse wearing a wedding gown and covered in blood, Alan decides to help her defend charges of murdering her groom.Meanwhile, Claire finds it difficult to take her client seriously when he is accused of stealing a cell phone, and Denny tries to win back Bethany by going to rehab.
GuestStars: William Russ, Megan Mullally, Leyna Nguyen, Jenjer Vick Robin, Stephen Hornyak, Wade Areal Junior, Jake Richardson, Pete Gardner, Michael P. McGill, Lovensky Jean-Baptiste, Judith Moreland, Debra Mooney, Patrick
